VehicleState.title: VehicleState
VehicleState.description: Represents the overall state of the EV, including telemetry, environment, and settings.

id.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle state.

odometer.description: The total distance the vehicle has traveled (km).

activeTrip.description: Indicates which trip (A or B) is currently active.

batterySOC.description: The current state of charge of the battery (%).

driveMode.description: The current drive mode (e.g., Eco, City, Sports).

acOn.description: Indicates whether the air conditioning is on.

acTemp.description: The target temperature for the air conditioning (Â°C).

ecoScore.description: A score representing the eco-friendliness of the driving style.

batteryCapacity_kWh.description: The total capacity of the vehicles battery

predictedDynamicRange.description: The predicted range of the vehicle based on machine learning predictions

energyThroughput_kWh.description: The lifetime energy throughput (kWh) of the battery.

cycleCount.description: The number of equivalent full charge cycles the battery has undergone.

isCharging.description: Indicates whether the vehicle is currently charging.

rawPredictedRange.description: The model's raw prediction for the vehicle range

ChargingLog.title: ChargingLog
ChargingLog.description: Represents a single charging session for the EV.

id.description: Unique identifier for the charging log entry.

startTime.description: The start time of the charging session (ISO 8601 format).

endTime.description: The end time of the charging session (ISO 8601 format).

startSOC.description: The state of charge of the battery at the start of the session (%).

endSOC.description: The state of charge of the battery at the end of the session (%).

energyAdded.description: The amount of energy added to the battery during the session (kWh).

definition.description: Stores the real-time and historical states of the EV. Documents are uniquely identified by vehicleStateId.

params.name: vehicleStateId
params.description: Unique identifier for the vehicle state document.

definition.description: Stores individual charging session logs. Documents are uniquely identified by chargingLogId.

params.name: chargingLogId
params.description: Unique identifier for the charging log document.
